author: David Cooper
comment: After finally figuring out how to change the different watch face colours using the android wear app, it actually doesn't look bad on my Moto 360, very nice vibrant colours, and liking the way it looks as a whole on my wear watch! Only gripe I have, is that I can't change the shape of the watch hands, and the outer numbers around the clock, but other than that its looking rather good!
title: Actually a pretty good watchface

author: john fiore
comment: The watches are OK. Good on battery good readability. But ok on watch face. I would like to see the second hand represent the bird or pig character on the end of the second hand to give the illusion that the bird is flying like the game. Or a star wars version. You have room to improve.
title: OK watch face

author: Wilfred Noel
comment: OK. So it works now. However, how does the "angry meter" work? And I really want to see the birds more often. What is the trigger for getting them to fly across the screen? More than a month with no updates or feedback.
title: Huh.

author: Kevin Miller
comment: This is very awesome to see a very acclaimed company like Rovio making a watch face or really several of them for Wear. It does have some kind of quirk about changing the different birds but it just took a couple of things to get it on whichever one I wanted. It's really polished looking down to the little details. I'm not sure if the anger meter is anything but random so it would be nice to have it hooked into something like heart rate or battery level. Nice to see the big boys making a free watch face!
title: Good news for Wear users.

author: The Dallas Duke
comment: Install watch face. Ensure that it's installed on your phone by going to installed apps and verifying that you can uninstall it. Then go to Android Wear ensure that your watch is linked to your phone then review notifications on watch. review up to where Angry Birds watch face is shown as installed then tap and then it will be part of your selection of watch faces on the watch and on the phone
title: Works

author: john huie
comment: love it so far but it seems stuck on the red watch face?  also, sometimes i get the flying bird animation, but i don't know what causes it.  would like to see it more often, but don't know what causes it.  i have it set to random faces, but only see the red face.

author: Owoteva Rob
comment: What would make this very functional is if you could link the anger meter to heartbeat. And maybe change the appearance of the birds to appear on the hour
title: Pretty straightforward

author: Sajag Bardia
comment: FOR THOSE WHO CANNOT CHANGE COLOUR       Just open android wear click on angry birds aviator a setting button will appear click on it and choose the colour
title: Loved it

author: Grace Tapping
comment: Does not show up on my screen SPECIFICALLY DESINGED FOR MY DEVICE. Rovio,I like angry birds and I'm loving your games but just try and stick to them and not cruddy watch faces . sorry for any troubles, please reply and try and fix this. strange how nobody else in the reviews I read a couple minutes ago are dissatisfied. Meh. My device is bsted up so its probably okay. Watevs.
title: Wut?

author: Chris Glass
comment: The face itself is nice, but the animations are improperly cropped and centered on the Huawei Watch.  Sadly since this hasn't been updated in a year I doubt that will change.

author: Thomas Adubato
comment: I love angry birds and I love the watch face. I actually found about Android wear from this and then bought a watch just so I could use it. I found out about other features of the watch later.
title: Love it

author: William Cheng
comment: I expected this to be cheesy, but it's actually a very practical and understated watch face (except for the occasional Angry Bird that flies by).
title: Surprisingly classy

author: Gerry H
comment: the watch face, as is, is very nicely done. Would be nice if I could change the time that anger builds or even the time interval between outbursts.

author: Alex Duong
comment: This would be a great watch face if the watch faces actually changed when set but instead it only displays the red one. No updates or responses from the creator either!
title: Watch face doesn't change

author: My Channel Does Not Belong on the Internet
comment: I love this product for one reason and one reason only and that is because it's Angry Birds. Other than that it's a pretty good watch face!

author: Derek Sarshad
comment: Despite picking other colors, only the red face persists.
title: Watch face doesn't change.

author: Mark Forrester
comment: I like these watch faces. You can change to use all the colours by using the android wear app on your phone. Great to have a watch face to match my Angry Birds t-shirt.
